Glendale.Maryvale, Phoenix:
Maryvale is an urban village of Phoenix, Arizona.


== History ==
Plans for Maryvale began to take shape during the 1950s, when developer John F. Long came up with the idea of developing a master-planned community on the western part of Phoenix, with an aim of turning the area into a working class suburb for Caucasians. It was the first master planned community in Arizona, and one of the first planned communities in the country.
